Talents.Name: Texas Tradition
Talents.Description: Gains +20% ATK during the duration of the passive skill; When defeating an enemy for the first time, fully restores HP and reactivates the effects of the passive skill

Talents.Name: Texas Swordsmanship
Talents.Description: Before defeating an enemy for the first time after each deployment, gains +8 ASPD and reduces all damage taken by 25%
